#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long t,i,j,k,l,m,n;
	string str;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		if(n%2==0)
		cout<<"Valar Morghulis"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"Lannisters always pays their debts"<<endl;
	}
}
